about_the_game:
"Hentai Pix" is a fantastic game, You can add any favorite pictures to the game, support jpg, png format, Can touch and graffiti, Make the picture look more sexy !

DLC adds more pictures !
F key to complete the puzzle quickly
Hentai Pix + Pixiv = Correct usage !

Game features


-Dynamic picture
Games can make pictures dynamic, Make the picture look more sexy !
-Powerful graffiti function
You can add something to the picture!
-Custom picture
You can add any favorite pictures to the game
-Adjust touch
Setting interface can adjust touch range R, touch intensity S, touch elasticity E
-Automatic touch
Right mouse button is automatic mode, Can let you free your hands to do other things
-Jigsaw game
The game contains a variety of jigsaw puzzles that can be selected through the game settings

"Hentai Pix" is a fantastic game, Make the picture a playable game !

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains some naked and pornographic content, All characters are over 18 years old

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4130
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or better
  • Storage: 140 MB available space

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Ukrainian, Russian, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Turkish, Greek, Norwegian, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Swedish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Romanian, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Arabic, Korean
